akn:content.akn:p:
§ 8934. Data usage(a) In generalThe Director shall provide the sampling data collected under section 8933 of this title to—(1) the Administrator; and
(2) other Federal and State regulatory agencies on request.
(b) UsageThe sampling data provided under subsection (a) shall be used to inform and enhance assessments of exposure, likely health and environmental impacts, and remediation priorities.
(Pub. L. 116–92, div. F, title LXXIII, § 7334, Dec. 20, 2019, 133 Stat. 2283.)
